title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 25 January 2017 - XWiki
content:

14:31 <woshilapin> has quit  
14:36 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki

14:40 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
15:01 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: the third bullet is badly displayed: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/9.0RC1/#HMiscellaneous-1  
15:02 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: forget this  
15:03 <vmassol> ok :)  
15:05 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: the end of the text as hidden by the pencil icon on my screen  
15:06 <gdelhumeau> it could be an issue  
15:06 <vmassol> works fine here  
15:06 <vmassol> even if I resize  
15:10 <Pbas> Hi everyone, I need a little help with ldaps authentication: to connect on our ldap server I need to set "TLS\_REQCERT  never". Do you have a way to insert it?  
15:16 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: I let you correct my little summary in the release notes :)  
15:19 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: so you already know that you've made mistakes? :)  
15:20 <gdelhumeau> I think this summary is a bit special  
15:22 <vmassol> now I'm curious  
15:22 <vmassol> seems you cheated  
15:22 <gdelhumeau> why?  
15:23 <gdelhumeau> We have decided not to dupplicate changes done on 8.4.x  
15:23 <gdelhumeau> but then the JIRA dashboards show them  
15:23 <gdelhumeau> so I had to find a way to explain that :  
15:23 <gdelhumeau> :)  
15:33 <vmassol> has quit  
15:37 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
15:44 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
15:56 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
15:58 <vmassol> "We have decided not to dupplicate changes done on 8.4.x"  
15:58 <vmassol> I don't agree  
15:58 <vmassol> personally I mentioned the opposite :)  
15:59 <vmassol> hmm checking somethng  
16:00 <vmassol> yes it olny depends of the since  
16:00 <vmassol> do we have the 8.4.5 items in the RN for 9.0RC1?  
16:00 <vmassol> (if so it's fine for now)  
16:01 <vmassol> actually not even sure we need to mention that it includes stuff done from 8.4.1 to 8.4.4  
16:01 <vmassol> it also contains stuff done for 7.x for ex :)  
16:01 <vmassol> but it's ok  
16:02 <vmassol> so it's acceptable as it is even though it doesn't look very sexy :)  
16:03 <vmassol> btw tmortagne, since you've implemented  filesystem recycle bin could we turn on FS attachments by default now?  
16:05 <vmassol> @gd: we still need to handle changes both in 8.4.5 and in 9.0RC1  
16:07 <gdelhumeau> (sorry I'm in a call)  
16:13 <msmeria> has quit  
16:14 <tmortagne> vmassol: I implemented document FS recycle bin and that was not the things missing to enable FS attachment by default  
16:14 <tmortagne> there is still various issues  
16:14 <tmortagne> i.e. I added a new features, not fixed the issues on other FS stores  
16:20 <gdelhumeau> \o/  
16:22 <vmassol> tmortagne: I must have read too quickly and thought you had implemented attachment FS recycle bin  
16:23 <tmortagne> no the issue was about document containing lots of attachments (i.e. document with a huge XML produced to store)  
16:24 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: indeed  
16:26 <tmortagne> vmassol: not that it's not all or nothing when talking about FS storage, we could enable some stores and not others  
16:27 <tmortagne> I did not enabled the new document recycle bin yet to be safe for now (i.e. experimental feature) but it does introduce any limitation like the other stores  
16:28 <tmortagne> the attachment store looks Ok too (but it would require improvement to deal with the transition first)  
16:29 <tmortagne> attachment recycle bin store need to be rethinked (probably on the same model than what I did for document recycle bin like I commented in the issue)  
16:29 <vmassol> one issue I know right now is that the AllDocs's attachment tab doesn't work for FS attachments  
16:30 <tmortagne> yes that's what I'm talking about  
16:30 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
16:30 <tmortagne> this one is fixable by applying the same logic than what is done for document recycle bin  
16:31 <tmortagne> which is like with attachment to keep metadata in the database and only store the huge value on filesystem  
16:31 <tmortagne> i.e. introduce an attachment recycle bin CONTENT store that would be used by the hibernate recycle bin store  
16:32 <tmortagne> FS store issues are fixable, just need to allocate time  
16:32 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
16:35 <tmortagne> same thing for the migration issue by the way, the way I implemented document recycle bin content FS store you don't need any migration (automated or not)  
16:53 <vmassol> tmortagne: ok, we need to find some time for this IMO because we've been waiting too long already to default to FS attachment  
16:53 <vmassol> I'm actually ok to move to FS attachments without the AllDocs attachment tab  
16:53 <vmassol> :)  
16:54 <vmassol> I think I sent a proposal but would need to check again  
16:54 <tmortagne> the migration issue is too a big issue IMO  
16:55 <tmortagne> we need to fix that before moving  
16:59 <sdumitriu1> has quit  
17:06 <evalica> has quit  
17:07 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki  
17:14 <Enygma`> has quit  
17:45 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
17:55 <vmassol> Note: I broke the HTML functional test on 8.4.x branch, fixing  
18:00 <tmortagne> vmassol: you see, sometime it fail :)  
18:01 <vmassol> :)  
18:01 <vmassol> should be fixed now
